name: ALUMNI of the EUROPEAN ASSOCIATION OF AEROSPACE STUDENTS
goal:
The objective of the Association shall be:
 to establish, foster and maintain a network of like-minded professionals in the aerospace sector
 to support the European Association of Aerospace Students
The Association does not pursue profitable purposes.
The Association shall endeavour to achieve its objectives by:
 organising events and providing opportunities for Aerospace Professionals to meet each other at a professional, cultural and social level;
 creating opportunities for Aerospace Professionals to gain insights into other aspects of the aeronautics and astronautics industry;
 representing their members wherever this is possible and necessary;
 and furthermore all lawful means which may be conducive to achieving the object set.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU space policy
Youth employment
Improving language learning in Europe
Adoption of the list of skills, competences and occupations of the classification for matching on the EURES portal.
Technical standards and formats for matching of vacancies and job seeker profiles on the EURES portal
